Description: Industry Atom is a new age Go To Market strategy firm and venture studio, helping fast growing B2B founders scale beyond the $10 M journey.
Full Description: Industry Atom is a new age Go-To-Market (GTM) strategy and tactical consultancy, dedicated to empowering the "hungry lions" of the business world—fast-growing B2B founders eager to scale their ventures. With a focus on surpassing the critical $10 million revenue milestone, Industry Atom leverages a blend of innovative methodologies, industry insights, and practical tools to help these ambitious leaders navigate the complexities of market expansion, customer acquisition, and revenue growth. The firm distinguishes itself by offering customized solutions that are tailored to the unique challenges and opportunities faced by B2B startups in the scale-up phase. Through a combination of strategic planning, market analysis, sales optimization, and marketing innovation, Industry Atom aims to accelerate growth and enhance competitive advantage for its clients. Industry Atom's approach is holistic, encompassing a wide range of services from market entry strategies to sales funnel optimization and digital transformation initiatives. The firm's expertise spans across various sectors, enabling it to provide actionable insights and strategies that are not only industry-specific but also aligned with the latest market trends and customer behaviors. By partnering with Industry Atom, B2B founders can expect to gain access to a wealth of knowledge, strategic guidance, and tactical support designed to streamline their GTM efforts. This partnership aims to not only achieve but exceed the $10 million revenue target, setting the stage for sustained growth and market leadership. Industry Atom is committed to transforming its clients into market leaders, capable of navigating the ever-evolving business landscape with agility, innovation, and strategic foresight.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Customers also have access to additional powerful tools like AD rotation placement, AD conversion report, and monthly business exposure. AdResst has also started a strategic partnership with Stroll Guam; the Island of Guam’s only Ride Share service provider. The partnership has allowed AdResst to instantly integrate into 38 Ride Share Vehicles in Guam. AdResst intends to expand into Southeast Asia as well, in the near future. To learn more about the service, please visit https://www.adresst.com. AdResst Founder/CEO – Lamont Duverne is an IT and advertising expert and enthusiast whose desire is to create a digital content platform that will change the business landscape. Rideshare hailing has become very popular today because of the need to reduce carbon footprint and make cities have less traffic. While taking a ride, a lot of people do almost nothing until they get to their destination. It’s one of the best time to get passengers’ attention and deliver creative advertising content to them. AdResst has a modern startup company has adopted a modern and highly Rideshare advertising philosophy where adverts are delivered in the form of video and infographic. These are usually very educative, entertaining, informative, and engaging, so while the advertising is running, the passenger is actually enjoying the presentation. Also, the digital advertising is delivered via Ultra HD tablets, so the images are clear and bright, while audio is also of top quality. Businesses can make all types of advertisement including fresh product awareness, mobile store discounts, and local events, explainer videos, product reviews, etc. AdResst offers an effective solution to delivering results for businesses to help them gain new customers. It’s the most convenient ways to get to customers while they’re still trying to make a final decision on the restaurant to visit, hotel accommodation, fun venues, and so on.

Description: Visual Field virtual reality platform. Intuitive and easy to use products powered by artificial intelligence
Full Description: Olleyes is a medical device company founded with the objective of revolutionizing eye-care. Our core product -VisuALL- is a visual field analyzer (perimeter) designed for standardized and mobile assessment of the visual field. VisuALL automatically analyzes the retinal sensitivity in patients with Glaucoma and other visual disorders. VisuALL enables the examination of multiple patients at a time increasing office productivity. Our innovative portable device leverages the power of virtual reality and artificial intelligence to enable eye-care providers to monitor common eye diseases remotely. Our devices allow medical professionals to monitor and diagnose patients from anywhere - a small room within the walls of the practice or at home - simultaneously leading to increased provider productivity and better patient outcomes. We are focused on developing mobile and home-based diagnostic products for the early detection of and better management of eye disorders like Glaucoma, Diabetic Retinopathy and Age-related Macular Degeneration. Main Street CEO and Co-founder, Danilo Vicioso, developed the concept for Main Street during his time as an Entrepreneur in Residence at Prehype, the venture studio that partners with large corporations like Coca-Cola, Lego, and Citi Bank, and has helped incubate it’s own companies (Ro, ManagedByQ, and BarkBox). Danilo’s appreciation for the home services industry began with his appreciation for his father. As a home service provider himself, Danilo's father did everything he could to help provide for his family. It was through witnessing this hard work and dedication that Danilo saw how challenging the path to entrepreneurship can be, and he became inspired to discover better ways to help entrepreneurs thrive. Description: Salesfolks is a SaaP (Sales as a Platform) that enables companies to find, crowdsource and grow a virtual, cloud-based sales force.
Full Description: How fast can you launch a sales team?  What if we could do it in a days instead of months? Salesfolks is on a mission to help companies crush their sales quotas by quickly building sales teams using a flexible sales force model. Salesfolks enables companies of any size to find, manage and scale flexible sales teams. Salesfolks is a SaaP (Sales as a Platform) that helps companies to leverage flexible, on-demand sales teams at a lower cost point than FTE (full-time employee) hiring.  With Salesfolks you pay one predictable rate to spin up a sales team, then tether part of the compensation to sales performance. Salesfolks helps businesses to establish, mobilize and grow flexible sales teams that can be scaled up/down as needed. The result is more sales, faster sales, and less risk (currently nearly 50% of sales hires never hit quota).

Description: Transform sensitive data into safe and atomic data for any sandbox
Full Description: tomtA™ True Atomic Privacy safely transforms sensitive data at an atomic level into Data as a Safe Asset (“DaaSA”) for data governance, analytics and MLOps teams to build products no longer subject to GDPR, PIPA, CCPA, HIPAA, NIST et al.  tomtA™ True Atomic Privacy is next generation privacy enabled technology that uses generative AI to deploy locally run “filters” to anonymize sensitive data in-transit between environments to ensure safe use. This relationship between real data and the anonymized data in a safe and usable format, or what we call “atomicity”, is not possible with current anonymization or de-identification solutions that rely upon synthetic data, classical differential privacy or homomorphic encryption.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, Silicon Valley, West Coast

Description: beycome is the first & only real estate company that realizes 100% of home transactions online.
Full Description: beycome is an innovative real estate company and listing platform that manages 100 percent of home transactions online; helping homeowners, buyers, and renters close a deal on their home. We’re dedicated to empowering home sellers, buyers, and renters by providing access to an incredible all-in-one database and putting commission dollars back where they belong: in your pocket. In the last 3 years, we’ve successfully closed over 2700 properties and saved our clients upwards of 35 million dollars. Our model saves homeowners from paying the traditional commission fees involved in a home sale (or 10 percent commission fee due in a rental transaction). And when the owner saves, buyers and renters get more negotiation power for a better deal. Everyone wins! The beycome way: At beycome, we are changing the rules of real estate by empowering home sellers, buyers, and renters to own their own deal and access everything they need for selling or finding and securing their new home, 24/7, all online. By immediately refunding 100 percent of the typical real estate commissions, we save our clients thousands of dollars, every sale, every time. It’s that simple. Our Real Estate Mission We are dedicated to making selling, buying, and renting a home easier, faster, cheaper, and more equitable by helping our clients through every step of the process, consolidating all necessary logistics in one place (online) and putting commission dollars back in your pocket. How It Works: beycome houses (pun intended) all the steps and processes for sellers, buyers, and renters in one place, fully assisting them on their search and the steps necessary to close a deal on their new home, with access to all the same resources and perks of a traditional real estate agent plus their rightful commission. We give users access to the biggest real estate database on the market and provide expert guidance from initial visit, through to closing the deal on your home. Real estate isn’t rocket science, so we’ve streamlined the process and created a simple and effective technology (combined with our team of real estate experts) to cut your costs, save search time, and improve your closing experience.

Description: Get business done anytime from anywhere on your phone or desktop.
Full Description: First and foremost, Tuvoli is a business to business platform. Tuvoli connects brokers (and operators who broker) to suppliers in a fast, efficient, and secure manner. We have built native mobile apps for iOS and Android that promise to let brokers and operators do business anytime, from anywhere. We believe that improving connectivity and leveling the playing field is in everyone's best interest. We need to work together to improve the quality of our product at the industry level, because that is the path to success for us all. Tuvoli has pre-loaded the jet aircraft in the US air charter fleet onto its platform from data published by the FAA. That means that for most charter companies, signing up is as simple as verifying their company and aircraft info. Our team is standing by to assist at any time along the way. Brokers will go through a verification process that may include a request for references. Once on the platform, operators will benefit immediately from free fleet flight tracking. Aircraft in your fleet are displayed on a US map that is updated in real-time. Flight strips provide information on the last flight and up-to-date information on any aircraft that are in the air. Searching for supply or demand begins with entering a point of origin. Our itinerary builder will show you the closest airports to any street address or place name, making it a simple matter to find the closest airport for your customer. Sourcing aircraft is fast and easy. You can select one or more aircraft in the search results and send out requests for quotes in a matter of seconds. Operators can respond to quotes on their desktops or mobile phones, with just a few clicks or taps. One of our truly game-changing features is our built in payment capability. We establish a no-fee FDIC insured bank account for every Tuvoli user (company). From there, our platform facilitates funds transfer between any two parties 24/7/365. We eliminate the risk of ACH fraud because we vette every company before they are allowed to transact on the platform. In addition to the ability to move money, we are introducing the concept of the guaranteed payment for air charter flights. We have been in the industry for decades, and we are quite familiar with the problems we all face. Operators are often waiting for a broker to wire, right down to the wire, or they are accepting a credit card hold, crossing their fingers that the funds will come through. On the other hand, there are plenty of cases where a broker has pre-paid for a trip only to have the aircraft become unavailable at the last minute. Our solution provides for the buyer (broker) to put the funds into a segregated staging account between the time the trip is confirmed and departure time of the flight. The funds are guaranteed to not move from that account until the trip is completed (or cancelled). Once a trip is complete funds can be moved in a matter of minutes (seconds really), and they can be moved any time of day, any day of the year. To sum it up, we believe that for our industry to grow, we have to change. We have to build faster, more secure payment systems, and a layer of connectivity between industry players that can support a faster, more consistent, more reliable product for charter consumers. We hope you'll join us on our quest to grow the air charter industry from the inside out.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England

Description: game development , game design
Full Description: Welcome to Devoted Studios, a passionate team of game developers dedicated to creating immersive and engaging gaming experiences. Our mission is simple - to develop games that captivate players and transport them to new worlds of adventure and excitement. We believe that games are more than just entertainment - they are a medium for storytelling, a platform for social interaction, and a means of personal expression. Our team is committed to bringing these elements to life in our games, crafting memorable experiences that resonate with players long after the credits roll. At Devoted Studios, we're not just game developers - we're gamers ourselves. We understand what it takes to create a great game, and we bring that passion and expertise to every project we work on. Whether it's an indie title or a AAA blockbuster, we approach each game with the same level of dedication and attention to detail, striving to create experiences that exceed our players' expectations. Our team is made up of talented individuals with diverse backgrounds and skillsets, including programmers, artists, designers, and writers. We believe that collaboration is the key to success, and we work closely together to ensure that every aspect of our games is carefully crafted and polished to perfection. We pride ourselves on our ability to innovate and push the boundaries of what's possible in game development. From cutting-edge graphics and advanced AI systems to unique gameplay mechanics and immersive storytelling, we're always looking for new ways to challenge ourselves and our players. At Devoted Studios, we're more than just a game development company - we're a community. We believe that games have the power to bring people together, and we strive to build strong, inclusive communities around our games. Whether it's through online forums, social media, or in-person events, we're always looking for ways to connect with our players and create meaningful relationships. So, whether you're a hardcore gamer or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, we invite you to join us on our journey of game development and discovery. Welcome to Devoted Studios - where passion meets play.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US

Description: Terawatt is the human capital marketplace. Connect with the best coaches for customized group learning that elevates company results.
Full Description: Terawatt is a B2B marketplace for human capital solutions and an easy plug-in for ambitious companies looking to solve pernicious institutional problems and achieve top-decile company results.  Why is employee development valuable?  Decades of research show that supporting employee growth translates into engagement, profitability, and innovation.  In February 2023, McKinsey issued a human capital report showing that top decile companies both demand employee accountability and also offer employee development. You can find the research here: https://www.mckinsey.com/mgi/our-research/performance-through-people-transforming-human-capital-into-competitive-advantage#/  How does Terawatt work?  Terawatt is a marketplace for group coaching experiences, similar to Airbnb. We recruit and vet expert, full-time coaches, and we act as a concierge & matchmaker to help companies bring their talents in-house. The benefit? Targeted professional development helps employees solve specific problems and achieve company-level results.   Terawatt’s group coaching brings measurable solutions for deficiencies in communication, mindfulness, negotiation, management, learned excellence, integrated DEI, public speaking, psychological safety, and many, many more. When these problems are solved, companies experience a ROI in the form of increased innovation, higher return on invested capital, increased economic profit, stronger culture, higher retention rates, and higher promotion rates.

Description: The Major League Scout for the Financial Industry
Full Description: Parcision revolutionizes the hiring process on Wall Street by introducing a crucial element: quantifiable skill. The current Wall Street hiring practice puts too much emphasis on alma mater and network connection, which deters many candidates. We aim to establish a quantitative approach that enables individuals from all backgrounds to assess their skills and demonstrate their accuracy in analyzing critical market events, such as company earnings and economic announcements. We firmly believe that regardless of identity, sex, race, location, or educational background, everyone deserves an equal opportunity to pursue a rewarding career in the financial industry. Through our blind hiring and skills-first approach, we hope to change the DNA of Wall Street. To achieve this, we harness the power of Web 3 technology, specifically smart contracts, to facilitate and oversee tamper-proof tests that quantify candidates' analytical capabilities. By leveraging this advanced technology, we ensure a transparent, auditable, and provable performance metric for participants. The most accomplished participants are duly acknowledged financially and reputationally based on their exceptional proficiency. This recognition is facilitated through participants' undeniable track records on Parcision. Parcision is chess for financial analysts.
Headquarters Regions: Greater New York Area, East Coast, Northeastern US
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Education, Financial Services, Other, Professional Services

Oobeya aims to help engineering leaders to optimize software engineering processes using data. * Oobeya's Approach: In software engineering, no one can measure productivity. The best thing we can do is to identify software development waste and bottlenecks. Identifying waste and working on reducing it will automatically increase development teams' productivity.  Oobeya offers a comprehensive platform to improve overall developer experience and productivity. Oobeya's Symptoms module automatically detects recurring anti-patterns, bad practices, and bottlenecks in software development and delivery processes by using engineering metrics. * What Oobeya Engineering Intelligence Platform Offers: - Oobeya's Gitwiser: Git Analytics, Pull Requests Analytics, Deployment Analytics (DORA Metrics) - Oobeya's AgileSpace: Board Analytics - Oobeya Dashboards: Customizable, Adaptable, Real-time metrics from the different data sources for all stakeholders in-a-single page - Oobeya Scorecards: Organization, Team, and Individual Level Metrics & Insights - Oobeya Gamification - Oobeya Symptoms

Description: C3M's Cloud Control offers cloud security governance, cloud risk scoring, compliance, IAM, SOAR and cloud inventory for the public cloud.
Full Description: C3M's Cloud Control is a 100% Agent-less, API based unified Cloud Security Management platform offering enterprises complete cloud control through automated and actionable cloud security intelligence giving deep insights into security posture, identity and entitlement governance, risk score and compliance status. Cloud Control can help safeguard your organization from multiple threat vectors, ensure regulatory compliance and help security teams be an enabler to the IT organization by putting in the right set of policy guardrails. It also helps CISOs and Security Teams assess and understand their cloud security and compliance posture regularly. The C3M Playbooks helps bring in SOAR context to cloud while the C3M Risk Scoring helps prioritise alerts based on their impact, severity, exploitability, and blast radius. At C3M we are on an endeavour to unify cloud security and avoid swivel chair security by combining all the key security use cases into a single platform. We are continually innovating, and our mission is to simplify cloud security. C3M currently supports AWS, GCP and Azure.

Description: The most efficient online platform for connecting equipment buyers & sellers.Designed by two Uber Engineers.We are a Minority Business.
Full Description: Equiphunter.com is a trusted online platform that simplifies the process of buying and started with one simple mission: better the way we work buying and selling equipment.  In the fast-paced business world, managing your time and resources is critical. Equiphunter.com delivers a highly efficient way of finding the right new and used equipment for your business by streamlining the communication, quotation requests, and procurement processes.  Equiphunter.com eliminates the exhaustive and time-consuming process of acquiring quotes, initiating multiple avenues of communication through calls or email, and spending hours searching for new and used equipment. Equiphunter.com saves you time and money and decreases the risk of communication errors. Simplify your search for equipment by narrowing down your specific needs to a single request.  EQUIPMENT BUYERS Create a FREE account, specify the details of the new and used equipment you need and send a single request. Equiphunter.com will forward your request to our marketplace database of trusted sellers with equipment matching your request. You will start to receive competitive quotes on your account dashboard for available equipment in your area, ready to compare. It’s that easy!  EQUIPMENT VENDORS Create your FREE account, and update your account details, including your service territory and types of equipment available, whether earthmoving, aerial, power, trench or more. Equiphunter.com will notify you when a potential buyer wants a quote for your equipment. For a small service fee, you’ll gain access to the contact information of your potential customer. When a buyer selects your proposal, you will receive a notification from Equiphunter.com to take action. It’s that simple!  WHO WE ARE Equiphunter.com is based in the U.S. and has been developed by an equipment industry professional with more than 20 years of experience in the U.S., Latin American, and European markets in response to the real challenges equipment buyers and vendors face. Built from scratch by a dedicated and experienced development team (who worked with Uber), the Equiphunter.com platform is: Simple – The most efficient online platform for connecting equipment buyers & sellers Safe – We never sell or share your information or store credit card details Secure – We work with world-leading partners to protect customer info, including a cyber security protocol. We are a minority business. Spanish and English team with small construction companies and also important manufacturers in our users base.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Miami Area, East Coast, Southern US
Industry Groups: Manufacturing, Real Estate, Software

Description: Trishula Therapeutics is a biotechnology company that focus on developing cancer medicines.
Full Description: Trishula is a privately held company dedicated to the development of TTX-030, a first-in-class, anti-CD39 antibody, in collaboration with AbbVie. TTX-030 inhibits the activity of CD39, an enzyme that converts ATP to AMP, the initial step in the generation of adenosine in the tumor microenvironment. TTX-030 prevents the formation of immune-suppressive extracellular adenosine and maintains high levels of immune-activating extracellular ATP, stimulating dendritic and myeloid-derived cells necessary for both innate and adaptive immunity.  Currently, TTX-030 is being studied in phase 1/1b clinical trials as a monotherapy and in combination with an anti-PD-1 agent and standard chemotherapy in adults with advanced cancer (NCT03884556 and NCT04306900).
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering

Description: Mobile App, SaaS, Recommendation Engine, Digital Assistant
Full Description: Food is the backbone of human survival. What began as a survival instinct, food has evolved to embody our contemporary civilization in all its aspects. Food culture is ubiquitous and intertwined with our daily life with diversified food choices from around the world. This immense possibility of choices has given rise to a very basic problem of decision-making in our lives: “what should I eat today?”, a trademark dilemma of at least 1 out of 10 people in your life presumably.  To resolve this daily challenge of decision making in choosing what to eat, we have developed Pikky, an AI driven personalized recommendation engine designed to simplify this process. Pikky’s engine not only simplifies the process of choosing what to eat but also maximizes satisfaction from your food choices. We pride ourselves in committing to assist you in every step of experiencing this unique food ecosystem. The journey begins with the most important step where we try to understand you and your food habits. Then with every use, Pikky analyzes every aspect of your food habit and exploratory food behavior and creates à la carte curated only for you. You have the flexibility to choose from our curated recommendations or explore by yourself to see what all the restaurants in your vicinity have to offer. After you have finally come to a decision, we reach the climax of the journey where we bring food to your doorstep so that you are optimally satisfied with your food choice and our recommendation.

Description: Propel Bio Partners is a global venture capital firm that invests in life science companies.
Full Description: Propel Bio Partners is a new private equity firm targeting high-potential business in the biosciences space. The firm was established during March 2022 by Dr. Leen Kawas and Richard Kayne. Dr. Kawas and Kayne established Propel Bio Partners with the mission to help biosciences businesses that have disruptive technologies further develop those technologies. The firm is especially interested in businesses that are ready to pursue clinical trials or regulatory approval, although promising businesses at other stages might also be considered.  When Propel Bio Partners invests in a business, the equity firm will provide both capital and supportive guidance. Starting with Dr. Kawas and Kayne, the firm’s leadership team is a veritable who’s who of the biosciences field. Dr. Leen Kawas comes to the investment firm from Athira Pharma, of which she was both Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer. At the pharmaceutical company, Dr. Kawas oversaw everything from drug discovery and clinical trials, to operations and financing. She has a doctoral degree in medical research. Richard Kayne has sustained a long career in private equity and venture capital, having established Kayne Anderson Capital Advisors in 1984. The Kayne Anderson firm grew to have billions under management. Richard Kayne has since been personally involved in several promising biosciences startups. A third member of Propel Bio Partners’ leadership team is Dr. Dasom Yoo, whose expertise is in regenerative medicine and stem cells. Dr. Yoo has previously conducted research at Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center. She is joining the private equity firm as a Senior Advisor. The trio is complemented by a board room that’s full of leaders from some of the top biosciences companies and high-level government agencies. These advisors have specialized expertise in many areas of research, medicine and business, and it’s Propel Bio Partners’ vision that companies the firm invests in will have access to board members when expertise is needed. Propel Bio Partners maintains offices in Los Angeles, California.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Los Angeles Area, West Coast, Western US

Headquarters Location: New York, New York, United States

Co-founded by @Colewherld, a social media influencer with a following of over 7 million and a reach exceeding 4 billion across platforms, OSSA.AI leverages cutting-edge AI to analyze scripts and other user inputs to produce short-form videos that are optimized and engineered for engagement on social media. What is our Mission? Our mission is to make influence accessible to everyone. We recognize that editing is often the most daunting part of creating content, so we've designed OSSA.AI to remove this barrier. Users need only a script and their video preferences to start creating engaging, short-form videos without the hassle of editing. What separates OSSA.AI from other AI-video generation platforms? OSSA.AI differentiates itself by offering complete creative freedom in video creation, moving beyond the limitations of template-based or less engaging AI-generated content found on other platforms. With OSSA.AI, users gain control over their content without the need for tedious editing processes, making content creation more straightforward and effective.

Description: machine learning, continuous intelligence, real time data science
Full Description: SymetryML is a cutting-edge machine learning technology that combines large-scale data mining, high-speed machine learning and real-time processing to produce a high-value continuous intelligence engine for transactional business processes and other real-time predictive modeling interactions. Able to process large datasets up to 30 times faster than the competition without the need to re-scan entire datasets, SymetryML can optimize models within seconds of data being updated. This unique capability – which reduces computing power and costs – allows for quicker deployments, more experimentation & faster results with transaction processing, logistics, B2B, customer-facing and other operational systems. Additionally, federated learning capabilities provide flexibility in data sourcing along with more extensive data security protections. While SymetryML is a highly technical tool for experienced data scientists, it comes with an easy-to-use UI that does not require coding skills to run projects, enabling business intelligence, quant or junior data science staff to use SymetryML effectively.

Description: ARTELLA Solutions is a digital healthcare company focused on remote cardiac monitoring.
Full Description: ARTELLA Solutions is a digital healthcare company focused on remote patient diagnostics - specifically for electrocardiograms. Electrocardiograms also known as ECGs are the gold standard in detecting heart rhythm disorders such as arrhythmias.  If a doctor suspects a heart rhythm disorder, they will prescribe an ECG test for a thorough assessment. If you or someone you know has been prescribed an ECG monitor, the monitor probably had multiple wires and electrodes placed around the torso. ARTELLA has developed a better solution. A solution focused on patient, staff and physician satisfaction. The ARTELLA ECG system records and displays patient’s ECG results in real time utilizing a wireless biosensor patch the size of a band aid. This makes life very convenient for the patient who can maintain their normal daily activities like working, exercising and bathing.   The ARTELLA ECG system is challenging the 3 big conglomerates in the cardiac monitoring market: iRhythm, Biotel and Preventice.  ARTELLA has developed a better solution.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Houston Area, Southern US
Industry Groups: Health Care

Description: PaperTrl is an automation tool that manages the procure-to-pay process for the mid-market.
Full Description: PaperTrl is a SaaS based procure-to-pay software platform specifically designed for organizations that require a high degree of rigor in their vendor sourcing, selection, purchasing and payment processes. In 2015 Baltimore, Maryland-based federal contractor Tidewater, Inc  was looking for an automation solution to help them manage 650 vendors and thousands of monthly invoices. After researching products in the market, they realized that most were just too big, too expensive, or put far too much burden of implementation on their small AP team. They wanted a solution that would not only help them to stem the growth of their AP department, but something that would enhance communication with their vendors. Prasad Dissanayake, President of Tidewater and engineer by profession, tapped friend and software engineer, Dimuthu Roshan, in Sri Lanka to recruit a development team to build what would eventually become PaperTrl. In less than one year the software transformed the Tidewater AP function. Payback came quickly as Tidewater saw huge increases in AP efficiencies. Due to its popularity among users and vendors, Tidewater decided to commercialize PaperTrl. Prasad chose software industry veteran Steve Weber as CEO. Steve had spent most of his career leading software companies that were focused on developing, marketing and supporting integration solutions for ERP and accounting software. As such he came with many years’ experience in the Intuit, SAGE, Microsoft Dynamics, Oracle, and SAP communities. Shilpa Marano joined the team as COO having worked with Steve at integration startup nChannel and IBM Sterling Commerce. Shilpa brought years of experience building successful marketing and product teams. Together with Dimuthu now serving as CIO, Steve and Shilpa were able to direct PaperTrl’s functionality to address an area of the market that was being underserved – specifically, an easy to implement, easy to use, but highly functional AP automation solution at an affordable price.
Headquarters Regions: Great Lakes, Midwestern US
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Media and Entertainment, Software
